stats avg(SampleValue) as "value" by _time mountpoint | fields _time mountpoint value | eval value = 100 - value `comment("Theses next few commands will fill gaps in the data")` | timechart limit=0 span=$trend_granularity|s$ avg(value) by mountpoint | filldown | reverse | filldown | reverse | untable _time mountpoint value `comment("Calculate the linear trendline - from (total_size_bytes / largest_disk) | eval bullet_used_size = used_percentage / 100 * bullet_total_size | eval relative_size = "##__SPARKLINE__## 200 " + bullet_used_size + " " + bullet_total_size | search.query: | fields _time disk_free_percentage | filldown | reverse | filldown | reverse | rename disk_free_percentage as value | eventstats count as numevents sum(_time) as sumX sum(value) as sumY sum(eval(_time*value)) as sumXY sum(eval(_time*_time)) as sumX2 sum(eval(value*value)) as sumY2 | eval slope=((numevents*sumXY)-(sumX*sumY))/((numevents*sumX2)-(sumX*sumX)) | eval yintercept= (sumY-(slope*sumX))/numevents | eval newY=(yintercept + (slope*_time)) | eval newY = 100 - newY | eval value = 100 - value | table _time value newY | rename value as "Usage %" newY as "Trend"
